summary: This is a certificate of authenticity from Amazon, Inc. regarding documents produced in response to a law enforcement request related to the criminal case against Ghislaine Maxwell. It certifies that the produced documents are authentic business records.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the external case number referenced in the Amazon law enforcement request and certificate of authenticity.

events.title: Amazon executes certificate of authenticity
events.description: An Amazon Law Enforcement Response Specialist executes a certificate of authenticity for documents produced in response to a law enforcement request related to Ghislaine Maxwell.

events.title: Certificate forwarded within FBI
events.description: The certificate of authenticity from Amazon is forwarded via email within the FBI's New York office.

locations: New York (NY) (implied from FBI office designation)
keyFacts: Amazon, Inc. produced documents in response to a law enforcement request related to the criminal case against Ghislaine Maxwell (External Case No. 2018R01618).
An Amazon employee certified under penalty of perjury that the produced documents are authentic business records created in the ordinary course of business.
The certificate of authenticity was executed on January 31, 2020, and was forwarded within the FBI on February 7, 2020.
The document indicates ongoing law enforcement investigation into Ghislaine Maxwell as of early 2020.
The communication is marked as potentially containing privileged and/or confidential information.
